entry.title: Libby for Secretary
entry.content: Libby running for Secretary in Elemantary school for 5th grade, May 11, 2014.

entry.title: Libby playing basketball
entry.content:
Libby playing basketball. Libby was really good at playing defense but really didn't like offense. Her team tried to put in a complex switching defensive scheme, but she didn't understand that. She got fouled once and had to take a foul shot. She didn't like that at all.

Libby playing Basketball ©2014 M. Andrew Eick

entry.title: Libby's Chorus Christmas 2013
entry.content: Libby singing with the Children's Chorus of Washington. They didn't take any video, but we did get the recording they made. The video is about 30 minutes long and contains both Libby's choir and the combined choir at the end of the performance.
